definition: to draw (e.g. a bow)/to pull/to stretch sth/to extend/to lengthen/to involve or implicate in/to attract/to lead/to guide/to leave/to provide evidence or justification for/old unit of distance equal to 10 丈[zhang4], one-thirtieth of a km or 33.33 meters

sentences.english: I finally tracked down the reference in a dictionary of quotations .
sentences.chinese: 我終於在引語詞典中查到了那段引文。

sentences.english: Each chapter begins with a quotation.
sentences.chinese: 每一章的開頭都有一條引語。

sentences.english: He usually begins his class with a joke.
sentences.chinese: 每一章的開頭都有一條引語。

sentences.english: The apt citations and poetic gems have adorned his speeches.
sentences.chinese: 貼切的引語和珠璣般的詩句爲他的演說詞增添文采。

sentences.english: These quotations cannot readily be traced to their sources.
sentences.chinese: 這些引語很難查出出自何處。

sentences.english: The apt citations and poetic gems have adorned his speeches .
sentences.chinese: 貼切的引語和珠璣般的詩句爲他的演說詞增添文采。

sentences.english: Throughout history, quotes of famous people are often misrepresented.
sentences.chinese: 歷史上，名人們的引語經常是誤傳的。

sentences.english: Some of the quotations mentioning the lost books provide clues to their content.
sentences.chinese: 有些關於迷失卷宗的引語提供了內容線索。

sentences.english: He comes up with so many quotable phrases.
sentences.chinese: 他說話時使用了大量引語。

sentences.english: I finally track down the reference in a dictionary of quotations.
sentences.chinese: 我終於在引語詞典中查到了那段文字。

sentences.english: Currently there exists a great amount of inappropriateness in quotes in Chinese journalism.
sentences.chinese: 目前我國新聞報道在引語使用方面存在大量失當現象。

sentences.english: Using a recorder is one way of making sure that any quotations you might use are accurate.
sentences.chinese: 答錄機是確保引語準確無誤的辦法之一。

sentences.english: Chapter One is a retrospection of the studies on speech reporting.
sentences.chinese: 第一章簡單回顧了轉述引語研究的歷史。

sentences.english: However, linguists have seldom involved in the study of reporting verbs.
sentences.chinese: 但是，對引語中轉述動詞的研究卻甚少有人涉及。

definition: to make far-fetched claims (idiom)/to offer outlandish explanations
forged book/book of dubious authenticity/misattributed book/Apocrypha
